title: My account was hacked
body: My account was recently hacked id like to know wht others steps i should take or what information i should add to my support ticket. i also wanna bring more attention to this because im afraid that someone will sell my account and change its name. please bump this if u see it

replies.body:
Since you have a ticket open and are already assigned to a specialist, I recommend you continue to work with your specialist so you can get this resolved as quickly as possible. 

Let me know if you have any questions.
